post.text:
We can't trust the DISHONEST media! We must bring the truth directly to the hard-working Americans who want to take our country back.

Help us bring the TRUTH by joining my #BigLeagueTruth Team! We're going to fact check Crooked Hillary -- BIG TIME!

Sign up here: http://bigleaguetruth.com

comment.author: Michael
comment.text: This is a Movement - a movement of American citizens who love their country, want our country to prosper, want to pass down a strong, safe country to our children, and who want to revive and sustain the American Dream that many of our citizens cannot yet envision. Trump 2016 all the way to The White House !

replies.author: Lindsey
replies.text: Isn't it ironic that Trump and the GOP have criticized the Clinton Foundation while Trump is actually misappropriating contributions for his own personal use to pay legal penalties, buy himself gifts and bribe politicians. The more you dig, the dirtier he is - no more than a crook

replies.author: Vittoria
replies.text: TRUTH: New York Attorney General SHUTS DOWN Trump Foundation Over Felony Fraud!! #CrookedTrump #LiarTrump #FailureTrump #CowardTrump #DumpTrump #NeverTrump
